subject: p13352405
History: Status post thoracotomy and decortication. Evaluation.
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, the patient has undergone a right thoracotomy and decortication. Three right chest tubes are in situ. There is a minimal right basal pneumothorax at the site of chest tube insertion. No evidence of tension. Mild right basal postoperative atelectasis. In the interval, the patient has been intubated, the tip of the tube projects 53 cm above the carina. Moderate cardiomegaly, unremarkable and unchanged left lung.
